website_summaries.verdict: Though it has a lot going for it, this reusable dust mask also comes with some concerns that may make it impractical for some users.
cons: Runs a bit small for some
Some users found the material a bit scratchy

customer_reviews.title: Nice idea but not very reliable.
customer_reviews.text: Its good about keeping stuff when breathing out but for me when I start sweating or moving when mowing the yard, it slides off my face pretty easy. I will have to find another product to cover my face when doing outside yard work :(
customer_reviews.author: Track79

customer_reviews.title: Do NOT purchase this! Bought it to filter out ...
customer_reviews.text: Do NOT purchase this! Bought it to filter out air during horrid Calif. Soberness fires. Looks very professionally made but it's total junk. Don't believe them when they tell you those little black circles are filters. They are NOT. I sent mine back and asked for refund.
customer_reviews.author: Finchie

customer_reviews.title: This mask is a joke. It does not stay ...
customer_reviews.text: This mask is a joke. It does not stay in place. The plastic piece above the nose cannot be reshaped to fit.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable & works!
customer_reviews.text: I use it to keep the dust out of my lungs when cleaning the chicken coop. Sooo much better than other models of dust mask that I have used for this purpose. The breathable material does not store up the humidity from your breathing against your face.
customer_reviews.author: Farm Girl

customer_reviews.title: Maybe fits a child not an adult.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is meant for a child of the age 4 maybe 5. It’s so tiny and so tight and I wear a size 7 hat. I have a small head and this thing no where near for my face. I threw it in the trash. What a waste of money! I think kids invented this mask.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: I don't think I have a particularly large face, but this was way too small for me. If the mask was on the bridge of my nose, the bottom of the mask wouldn't even cover my chin. Can't speak to the quality of filtering it does, but I don't see why it wouldn't do a reasonable job. I wish it came in a variety of sizes.
customer_reviews.author: njimse

customer_reviews.title: Good filter, poor nose clip
customer_reviews.text: It does its job, but the nose clip is lacking. The whole thing slides down my face, and I have to adjust it rather regularly. The nose clip is also just plain uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: B. Loeb

customer_reviews.title: fitment
customer_reviews.text: nice and sturdy but the fit was a little tight for my big head
customer_reviews.author: shelly rohrer

customer_reviews.title: I'll give it 3 stars because it seems to work ...
customer_reviews.text: I'll give it 3 stars because it seems to work for other people, but for me it wouldn't even stay on my face, the strap just slides down instantly.
customer_reviews.author: A. Gift For You

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Too tight on the nose clip and not adjustable to make it any less tight.
customer_reviews.author: Connie

customer_reviews.title: ... an okay mask and seems to work as a good filter. But
customer_reviews.text: It is an okay mask and seems to work as a good filter. But, the quality is not as good as others we have seen.
customer_reviews.author: Betty Bee

customer_reviews.title: Poor Design
customer_reviews.text: I've now used this mask for several months while travelling in SE Asia. Good concept, poor design puts pressure on your nose making it difficult to breathe through nose. Most masks wrap over/around ears. This one wraps around neck forcing you to look down to breath normally.
customer_reviews.author: Bhimsen

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't fit well on my slim husband's face. Lots of big open gaps.
customer_reviews.author: MWO

customer_reviews.title: one size does not fit all.
customer_reviews.text: It appears to come in one size, small. I have a large head and this does not go around my chin at all. No size selection it appears. So beware of your face size.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Baker

customer_reviews.title: Not great for painting
customer_reviews.text: I used this because I'm pregnant and wanted to paint. I found this uncomfortable to wear and didn't feel like it blocked the fumes. While I was painting I could smell the paint fumes even in a well ventilated room with all the windows open. I would not recommend for painting.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer
